name: 14th Murder
description:
Driven by a note written that 14 murders will be committed by the serial killer, the detective follows a case to find the reason behind the serial murders. 

The game contains two endings.

My first game as an amateur pixel artist and game maker, I hope you like it.

CONTROLS

A,D - Movement 

S - Crouch

E - Interaction

F - Lantern

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot (when aiming)

RMB - Aim

You can use the typewriters around to save the game.
